name: CartoMobileSDK
summary: CARTO Mobile SDK is an advanced MapView with 3D effects, offline maps and many more features
description:
Advanced MapView API

* Offline map packages
* 2.5D view - tilting, rotating, navigation view
* 3D models on map
* Use your custom map data sources
* Same API for iOS, Android, Xamarin, Windows Phone

By carto.com
